snippet: The maker of high-end electric cars said it achieved its target of building 35,000 vehicles last year, but increased spending took a toll.
abstract: Tesla Motors reports revenue of $3.2 billion in 2014, compared with around $2 billion previous year, and net loss of $294 million, compared with $74 million in 2013; fourth-quarter revenue is reported as $957 million, increase from $615 million in same period year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The maker of high-end electric cars said it achieved its target of building 35,000 vehicles last year, but increased spending took a toll.

headline.main: Tesla Motors Met Its Output Goal, but Showed a 4th-Quarter Loss
headline.print_headline: Tesla Motors Met Its Output Goal, but Showed a 4th-Quarter Loss
